fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sron.interfaces

Interface MessagingI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    NodeServicesCI
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiffusionNodePlugin, ElectionNodePlugin, NodeServicesConnector, NodeServicesInboundPort, NodeServicesOutboundPort, SRONNodePlugin

    public interface MessagingI
    The class MessagingI declares the signatures of methods used in communicating over the ring overlay network.

    Description

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Created on : 2019-04-04

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void acceptOrPass(StandardMessage m)
      accept (and process the message) or transmit it to the next node in the ring; method used for point-to-point communication.
      void broadcast(StandardMessage m)
      broadcast the message over the ring overlay network.
